mapper.update: UPDATE ht_borrow_recover hbr SET hbr.repay_batch_no = #{repayBatchNo}, hbr.recover_account_yes = IFNULL(hbr.recover_account_yes,0) + #{recoverAccountYes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hbr.recover_interest_yes = IFNULL(hbr.recover_interest_yes,0) + #{recoverInterestYes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hbr.recover_capital_yes = IFNULL(hbr.recover_capital_yes,0) + #{recoverCapitalYes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hbr.recover_account_wait = IFNULL(hbr.recover_account_wait,0) - #{recoverAccountWait,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hbr.recover_interest_wait = IFNULL(hbr.recover_interest_wait,0) - #{recoverInterestWait,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hbr.recover_capital_wait = IFNULL(hbr.recover_capital_wait,0) - #{recoverCapitalWait,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hbr.repay_charge_interest = IFNULL(hbr.repay_charge_interest,0) + #{repayChargeInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hbr.repay_delay_interest = IFNULL(hbr.repay_delay_interest,0) + #{repayDelayInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hbr.repay_late_interest = IFNULL(hbr.repay_late_interest,0) + #{repayLateInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, hbr.recover_fee_yes = IFNULL(hbr.recover_fee_yes,0) + #{recoverFeeYes,jdbcType=DECIMAL} WHERE hbr.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
